service.name: biblija_net
service.step: select passage.content from xml where url="$url"

service.name: usccb_org
service.step: select item.text.content from xml where url="$url" and item.passage=$passage

service.name: crosswire_org
service.step: select passage.content from xml where url="$url"

service.name: diebibel_de
service.step: select passage.content from xml where url="$url"

service.name: unbound_biola_edu
service.step: use "http://www.datatables.org/data/htmlpost.xml" as htmlpost; select * from htmlpost where xpath="*" and url="http://unbound.biola.edu/index.cfm?method=searchResults.doSearch" and postdata="search_type=simple_search&parallel_1=$edition&book=$book&from_chap=$chapter&from_verse=$passage&submit=Search"
select passage.content from xml where url="$url"

service.name: bibliacatolica_com
service.step: select * from html where url="http://www.bibliacatolica.com.br/$edition/$book/$chapter.php" and xpath="//*[(@id = 'biblia')]//tr[$passage]//td[(((count(preceding-sibling::*) + 1) = 2) and parent::*)]/p"

service.name: laparola_net
service.step: select passage.content from xml where url="$url"
